forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. A mix of clouds and sun. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. S winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. S winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around 5C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 57F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early giving way to clouds and a few showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
